Title: Red Cliff
Writer: John Woo (screenplay), Khan Chan (screenplay), Cheng Kuo (screenplay), Heyu Sheng (screenplay), Guanzhong Luo (novel)
Actors: Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Takeshi Kaneshiro, Fengyi Zhang, Chen Chang
Plot: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).
Country: China, Hong Kong, Japan, Taiwan, South Korea, USA
Production: Shanghai Film Group, Beijing Film Studio, Lion Rock Productions, China Film Group Corp., Emperor Multimedia Group (EMG) [hk]
